long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improdds provides job seekers the ability to match their skills with a job posting and get a ranking score for that Job posting. Improdds also provides the ability to bookmark jobs postings all in one place.

All you need to do is create an account, save your various skills and go from there!
